backend/main.mo: Primary backend canister implementing user profiles, service request creation and management, authorization, and status handling.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old service request data structures to the updated format with new fields like servicesRequested and totalPriceEstimate.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to involved frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten one‑sentence summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables, themes, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setup including router configuration, layout, theme provider, and shared UI components.
frontend/src/components/admin/NotesPanel: Allows admins to view and add public or internal notes on a request with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied message with login or home navigation depending on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loaders or denial when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity with loading states and query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter name and optional email, then saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/BrandCard.tsx: Reusable card component applying consistent themed border, background, and shadow styles.
frontend/src/components/FormField.tsx: Reusable form field wrapper providing label, helper text, error display, and consistent spacing.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Displays categorized service pricing cards by pulling grouped services and formatting their prices.
frontend/src/components/RequestStatusTim: Renders a vertical timeline of request status changes with timestamps and current status highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ServiceSelection: Provides grouped checkboxes for selecting services from the catalog and emits updated selections.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Shows footer navigation, service lists, and attribution with dynamic year and tracking links.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with navigation, login, admin link handling, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientSideReferenc: Manages client-side image files with preview URLs, providing add, remove, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend service request operations in React Query hooks for creating, fetching, and updating requests and notes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Contains a static service catalog with pricing and helpers for filtering, formatting prices, and calculating totals.
frontend/src/lib/statusUtils.ts: Maps request statuses to labels and UI variants.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestDet: Admin page for viewing a full service request, updating status and price estimates, and accessing notes and history.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRequestsPa: Admin interface for listing and filtering all service requests with status filters and navigation to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with hero, services, and scroll-to-pricing behavior.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestConfirm: Displays a confirmation message for a submitted service request and shows the request ID with navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceRequestPage.ts: Provides a form for creating a service request, including validation, image uploads, service selection, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/StatusLookupPage.tsx: Allows users to enter a request ID to look up the status and details of a service request, showing timelines and errors when needed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color and theme settings, animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state including pricing-update features, pending requests, and metadata for a controller service pricing and selection system.
